overview: This series puts big, built guys together with alluring, adventurous ladies. Featured cover girl Emma Hix is a masseuse who cant keep her hands from roaming around. This blonde is in need of what her new client is packing, and no professional boundaries will keep her from getting a grip on his lust muscle. Eveline Dellai, Hime Marie, and Clea Gaultier are also seeking interracial arrangements.
title: Black & White 18
